Plot: An NFL quarterback living the bachelor lifestyle discovers that he has an 8-year-old daughter from a previous relationship.
Title: The Game Plan
Writer: Nichole Millard (screenplay), Kathryn Price (screenplay), Nichole Millard (story), Kathryn Price (story), Audrey Wells (story)
Actors: Dwayne Johnson, Madison Pettis, Kyra Sedgwick, Roselyn Sanchez
tomatoConsensus: Despite The Rock's abundant charisma, The Game Plan is just another run-of-the-mill Disney comedy.
